templates.name: Product Photoshoot
templates.instruction:
Upload product image and describe a scene or setting to create product shots

Note: this template is in beta and may not work as expected sometimes.
templates.description: Need professional product shots but lack a studio budget? This AI-powered product photoshoot template turns ordinary pictures into glossy, high-resolution catalog images. Perfect for Shopify, Amazon, Etsy, and social ads, it auto-adjusts lighting, shadows, and backgrounds to match brand aesthetics. Simply upload your item, pick a scene, and export ready-to-sell visuals in seconds. Boost click-through rates, lower bounce, and convert more shoppers with consistent, eye-catching imagery.

meta.keywords: product photo generator, AI product photography, ecommerce images
meta.title: AI Product Photo Generator – Studio-Quality Images in Seconds
meta.description: Create studio-quality product photos instantly. Our AI product photo generator delivers crisp ecommerce images without expensive gear or photoshoots.

textConfig.placeholder: Eg. a PELLECOTE perfume bottle, matte finish
Weathered wood, stones, dried branches and charcoal surround bottle on dark grey.

templates.name: Make Me Bald
templates.instruction:
Upload your image to make yourself bald

Note: this is a fun template and may not be used by/for kids, doing so will result in failure.
templates.description: Test-drive the bald look before committing. This AI template maps facial contours, removes hair strands, and renders natural skin texture, subtle scalp shine, and correct lighting for a convincing result. Share the transformation on social media, prank friends, or explore style options risk-free. Works on any frontal portrait with adjustable beard retention for even more customization.

meta.keywords: bald filter, shave head photo effect, AI bald generator
meta.title: AI Bald Filter – See Yourself Bald Instantly
meta.description: Curious how you’d look without hair? Upload a selfie and our bald filter simulates a realistic shaved head in seconds—no clippers needed!

templates.name: Remove Watermark
templates.instruction:
Upload an image to remove the watermark

Note: this template is in beta and may not work as expected sometimes.
templates.description: Stop losing time to manual cloning. This template leverages deep-learning inpainting to detect and delete intrusive watermarks, timestamps, and logos while intelligently reconstructing the underlying pixels. Preserve edge sharpness and color accuracy for a flawless finish suitable for print or web. Drag, drop, and download—no Photoshop skills required. Ideal for photographers, bloggers, and marketers who need clean visuals fast.

meta.keywords: AI watermark remover, remove watermark online, clean images
meta.title: Remove Watermarks Online – Fast, AI Cleaner
meta.description: Erase watermarks, dates, or logos from photos in one click. Our AI watermark remover restores clean, high-quality images without blur or artifacts.

templates.name: 80s Anime
templates.instruction: Upload an image to transform into a Ghibli-style artwork
templates.description: Bring the enchanting worlds of Studio Ghibli to life with this advanced style-transfer template. It infuses photos with painterly brushstrokes, pastel palettes, and cinematic depth reminiscent of classics like Spirited Away and Totoro. Perfect for profile pics, posters, or creative projects, it maintains subject integrity while adding animated backgrounds and atmospheric lighting. One upload—endless Miyazaki-style storytelling.

meta.keywords: Ghibli style image generator, anime art filter, Studio Ghibli effect
meta.title: Ghibli Style Art Generator – Turn Photos into Anime Magic
meta.description: Transform selfies or landscapes into whimsical Ghibli-inspired art. Our AI anime filter adds dreamy colors, soft lines, and storybook charm.

templates.name: Humanize My Pet
templates.instruction: Upload an image of your pet to see them as a human
templates.description: Ever wondered how your pet would look as a person? With the Humanize My Pet template, upload your pet's photo and watch it transform into a humanized character with detailed facial features and personality cues. This creative tool uses advanced AI to generate vibrant, lifelike images combining animal traits with human aesthetics. Ideal for social media posts, personalized gifts, or just a fun digital makeover, bring your pet’s character to life like never before.

meta.keywords: humanize my pet, pet to human conversion, AI pet humanizer
meta.title: Humanize My Pet – Turn Your Pet into a Human Character
meta.description: See your furry friend in a whole new light. Our AI pet humanizer converts pet photos into stunning human likenesses with artistic charm.

templates.name: 3D Cartoon
templates.instruction: Upload an image to transform into a Pixar style
templates.description: Discover a whole new dimension of storytelling with the Pixar Style template. This tool reimagines your photos with the bright, whimsical aesthetics reminiscent of Pixar masterpieces. It highlights expressive eyes, dynamic lighting, and smooth, playful contours to create images that pop off the screen. Perfect for social media avatars, animated stories, or digital art projects, let your photographs tell a captivating animated tale.

meta.keywords: Pixar style image generator, animated art filter, AI Pixar transformation
meta.title: Pixar Style Image Converter – Create Animated Magic
meta.description: Transform photos into charming, Pixar-inspired characters with our AI-powered generator. Bring your images to life with vibrant colors and animated style.

templates.name: Springfield Cartoon
templates.instruction: Upload an image to transform into a Simpson style
templates.description: Step into the animated world of Springfield with the Simpson Style template. This fun and engaging tool transforms ordinary photos with a vibrant, cartoonish filter that mimics the look of The Simpsons. Expect playful exaggeration, bold lines, and that signature yellow tone that makes your images stand out. Great for fans, custom avatars, or quirky gifts, let your photos join the antics of Springfield in a creative and humorous way.

meta.keywords: Simpson style image generator, yellow cartoon filter, AI Simpson transformation
meta.title: Simpson Style Image Generator – Enter Springfield
meta.description: Convert your photos into iconic Simpson-style cartoons. Our AI tool gives your image a fun, yellow-toned twist inspired by the legendary animated series.

templates.name: Block Pixel
templates.instruction: Upload an image to transform into a Minecraft style
templates.description: Capture the essence of your images with a twist of blocky creativity using the Minecraft Style template. This tool transforms photos into vibrant, pixelated artwork reminiscent of the classic Minecraft aesthetic. Whether for gaming avatars, profile pictures, or unique art projects, it recreates images with clear, recognizable details in a fun, retro style. Experience a new way to appreciate your digital memories with an artistic block-building makeover.

meta.keywords: Minecraft style image generator, block art converter, pixel art transformation
meta.title: Minecraft Style Image Converter – Pixel Art Magic
meta.description: Turn your favorite photos into Minecraft-inspired pixel art. Our AI tool applies a blocky, vibrant style perfect for gamers, memes, and digital art.
